problem: 如图,已知点C为线段AB上一点,AC=12cm,CB=\frac{2}{3}AC,D、E分别为AC、AB的中点,则DE的长是()
answer: 【解答】解:根据题意,AC=12cm,CB=\frac{2}{3}AC,所以CB=8cm,所以AB=AC+CB=20cm,又D、E分别为AC、AB的中点,所以DE=AE-AD=\frac{1}{2}(AB-AC)=4cm．即DE=4cm．
comment: 本题考查了两点间的距离,熟知各线段之间的和、差及倍数关系是解答此题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that point C is a point on the line segment AB, AC=N_0cm,CB=\frac{N_1}{N_2}AC, D and E are the midpoints of AC and AB respectively, then the length of DE is ()
